page.title: 12Clubs & Societies (ii)
page.content:
8.{Constitutional club}:A social club for tennis, badminton, skittles etc. 9.{Gardening assoc.}:A club for gardeners 10.{Museum & Preservation society :Help run the local museum. 11.{Carnival society}:Runs the carnival & other events. 12.{Carnival clubs}:Build floats for local carnivals. 13.{British legion}:A group of local ex-servicemen & women. 14.{Over 60's club}:A social club.
The area also has branches of many charities e.g. Amnesty International, The Red Cross, Home farm Trust, Leukaemia Research, Cancer Relief, Save the Children, R.N.L.I. & the Samaritans.
